channel.title: Need a developement team+if i can mods- PLEASE READ!
channel.description: At the moment i have made myself a project. you may have seen the post if you haven't i want to make a rpg game like rs2 but better! At the moment i have been working on the website which has been developed succesfully with minor glitches- the login works, admin control panel, you can chnager your password-its secure and alot of other stuff which i will be showing the team. i want to make a really good game and want us to come up with ideas. people might start saying stuff about us getting sewed due to copyright but we wont because we will be changing the format for example the chat we dont have to have it like that it can be changed as can other stuff. [hr] can you please post whoever will join and i will show you the website and what i have done so far. ps. can we please get some moderators help persumbly mod tharok* *sorry if i spelt it wrong. :)

item.title: Need a developement team+if i can mods- PLEASE READ!
item.dc:creator: @dany dany
item.description:
@dany wrote:

The game is about gods and players have to choose a god when they start the tutorial. everyone does this and lets says once a month theres a big fight say 2 gods against the other 2 gods. when there isnt a fight everyone has to go round and make money, get armour and be the best. you ahve to go to a place for this fight thing to happen so if you dont want to be involved you dont have to be involved. i also want everyone else to coem upw ith ideas, i mean if you can do something really good…dont hesitate or ask because i aint the leader just put it in. i tell you something now there is no leader, if someone says they are ignore them because they are talking bullshit their is no leader!
ps. please come up with some ideas.

Read full topic

so i ask you please will you help me? Thanks.
